Class LewisViewWindow

                          +--fr.emn.easymol.gui.LewisViewWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants, java.io.Serializable
public class LewisViewWindow
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane

The Lewis View of a Molecule.

This component is a JPanel containing Atom2D components (the atoms of the molecule) and a list of all the links of the molecule. Synchronization with EasyMol core data structure is implemented.

See Also:
Serialized Form
